Absolute Joi By Dr. Anne Balancing pH Skin Toner With Aloe

Brand: AbsoluteJOI

Category: Toners/Astringents

Brand: AbsoluteJOI

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aloe Vera (Aloe Barbadensis) Leaf Juice, Water (Aqua), Saccharide Isomerate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Oat (Avena Sativa) Kernel Extract, Sclerotium Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Potassium Sorbate, Sorbic Acid
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
